column7: NOTE: noting this because i (supper) am an idiot and originally filled it in as "blue sword": this is an 葵の剣, referencing the three-葵 crest of the Tokugawa clan, which is famously associated with (the TV drama of) Mito Koumon, from whom you receive this item.
NOTE: opting for "first/second letter" rather than "letter 1/2" so it works better with the message shown when using the item; "Ziria used the Letter 1!" just isn't quite right
NOTE: inconsistently referred to as てつぽう and てっぽう in different places. not sure if that's meant to be a joke or not.
NOTE: technique names (techniques are internally handled as items). readings are taken from script_info.
